title: Bill Nye Greatest Discoveries 6 Full Length Episodes Homeschool
description:
Download K-Lite Codec pack or similar product BEFORE you try to watch this.

CLICK ON MY NAME (CEZEN) TO SEE A COMPLETE LIST OF MY EDUCATIONAL AND HOMESCHOOL TORRENTS.

I can't tell if 100 greatest discoveries is a shortened version of this series, or if this series is a LENGTHENED version of 100 Greatest.  If someone knows, please tell us.

The Episodes in this torrent are as Follows: (and to my knowledge these are ALL of the episodes)

1.  Astronomy
2.  Earth Science
3.  Genetics
4.  Medicine
5.  Physics
6.  The Origin and Evolution of Life

These are rips from www.cosmeo.com that I caputred from live streaming video.  I am new at this!  

These open using VLC (I had varied results wtih quality) and had VERY GOOD quality using Windows Media Player or Real Player.

I cannot seed every minute of everyday, so please be patient and do your part of seeding!  You CANNOT find this torrent ANYWHERE ELSE on the net right now.  I wish I had DVD rips instead of captured streaming video :(  Someday!
